verses.verse: Honour <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Thy Father <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother, <S%G3384><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> The First <S%G4413><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Promise, <S%G1860><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Well <S%G2095><s%> With Thee <S%G4671><s%> It May Be, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Mayest Be <S%G2071><s%> Long Lived <S%G3118><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Provoke <S%G3949><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Your Children, <S%G5216><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Bring Up <S%G1625><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Discipline <S%G3809><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Admonition <S%G3559><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Bondmen, <S%G1401><s%> Obey Your <S%G5219><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Masters <S%G2962><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trembling, <S%G5156><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Simplicity <S%G572><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Of Your Heart, <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> ' With <S%G2596><s%> Eye Service <S%G3787><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Men Pleasers; <S%G441><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Soul, <S%G5590><s%>
' With <S%G3326><s%> Good Will <S%G2133><s%> Doing Service <S%G1398><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To Men; <S%G444><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Whatsoever <S%G5100><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> May Have Done <S%G4160><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> He Shall Receive <S%G2865><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Free. <S%G1658><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Masters, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Same Things <S%G846><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Giving Up <S%G447><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Threatening, <S%G547><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Own <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Respect Of Persons <S%G4382><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G2076><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%>, For The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> <S%G80><s%>, My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> Be Empowered <S%G1743><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2479><s%> Of His Strength. <S%G846><s%>

Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Panoply <S%G3833><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Able <S%G1410><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Stand <S%G2476><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Artifices <S%G3180><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Devil : <S%G1228><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wrestling <S%G3823><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Principalities, <S%G746><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Authorities, <S%G1849><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World Rulers <S%G2888><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Age <S%G165><s%> This, <S%G5127><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spiritual Powers <S%G4152><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Wickedness <S%G4189><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavenlies. <S%G2032><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Take Up <S%G353><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Panoply <S%G3833><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be Able <S%G1410><s%> To Withstand <S%G436><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil, <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All Things <S%G537><s%> Having Worked Out <S%G2716><s%> To Stand. <S%G2476><s%>

Stand <S%G2476><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> Having Girt About <S%G4024><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3751><s%> Your Loins <S%G5216><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breastplate <S%G2382><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Shod <S%G5265><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> With The <S%G1722><s%> Preparation <S%G2091><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace : <S%G1515><s%>

Besides <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Having Taken Up <S%G353><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shield <S%G2375><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith, <S%G4102><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Will Be Able <S%G1410><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darts <S%G956><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One <S%G4190><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Burning <S%G4448><s%> To Quench. <S%G4570><s%>

Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Helmet <S%G4030><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Salvation <S%G4992><s%> Receive, <S%G1209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sword <S%G3162><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%>

By <S%G1223><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Supplication <S%G1162><s%> Praying <S%G4336><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Season <S%G2540><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G846><s%> Very Thing <S%G5124><s%> Watching <S%G69><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Perseverance <S%G4343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Supplication <S%G1162><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Saints; <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> May Be Given <S%G1325><s%> Utterance <S%G3056><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Opening <S%G457><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Of My Mouth <S%G3450><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> To Make Known <S%G1107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Am An Ambassador <S%G4243><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Chain, <S%G254><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> I May Be Bold <S%G3955><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

<S%G2443><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> May Know <S%G1492><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> ' Concerning <S%G2596><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I Am Doing, <S%G4238><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Will Make Known <S%G1107><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Servant <S%G1249><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord : <S%G2962><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Sent <S%G3992><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%> This Very Thing, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Might Know <S%G1097><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Might Encourage <S%G3870><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts. <S%G5216><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Incorruption. <S%G861><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Ephesians <S%G2180><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Tychicus. <S%G5190><s%>
